name: Rolling Bird
description: Rolling Bird is a retro arcade shooter, heavily inspired by Namco's 1986 classic 'Rolling Thunder'.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Series Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
